parametersDescriptions.buttonRef: The ref of the trigger button element.
parametersDescriptions.defaultOpen: If true, the select will be open by default.
parametersDescriptions.defaultValue: The default selected value. Use when the component is not controlled.
parametersDescriptions.listboxId: The id attribute of the listbox element.
parametersDescriptions.listboxRef: The ref of the listbox element.
parametersDescriptions.multiple: If true, the end user can select multiple values. This affects the type of the value, defaultValue, and onChange props.
parametersDescriptions.onChange: Callback fired when an option is selected.
parametersDescriptions.onHighlightChange: Callback fired when an option is highlighted.
parametersDescriptions.onOpenChange: Callback fired when the listbox is opened or closed.
parametersDescriptions.open: Controls the open state of the select's listbox. This is the controlled equivalent of the defaultOpen prop.
parametersDescriptions.options:
An alternative way to specify the options.
If this parameter is set, options defined as JSX children are ignored.
parametersDescriptions.optionStringifier:
A function used to convert the option label to a string.
This is useful when labels are elements and need to be converted to plain text
to enable keyboard navigation with character keys.
parametersDescriptions.value: The selected value. Set to null to deselect all options.

returnValueDescriptions.buttonActive: If true, the trigger button is active (pressed).
returnValueDescriptions.buttonFocusVisible: If true, the trigger button has a visible focus.
returnValueDescriptions.contextValue: A value to be passed to the SelectProvider component.
returnValueDescriptions.dispatch:
Action dispatcher for the select component.
Allows to programmatically control the select.
returnValueDescriptions.getButtonProps: Resolver for the button slot's props.
returnValueDescriptions.getListboxProps: Resolver for the listbox slot's props.
returnValueDescriptions.getOptionMetadata: A function that returns the metadata of an option with a given value.
returnValueDescriptions.highlightedOption: The value of the highlighted option.
returnValueDescriptions.options: Values of all the registered options.
returnValueDescriptions.value: The value of the selected option(s).
